items.title: Salesforce: RPO Growth Inflection Could Be The Next Catalyst
items.description: Salesforce faces near-term headwinds in growth and margins, but improving guidance and valuation create long-term upside potential. See why CRM stock is a buy.

items.title: 10 No-Brainer Artificial Intelligence (AI) Stocks to Buy Right Now
items.description: Nvidia, AMD, Broadcom, TSMC, and ASML are all strong plays on expanding AI infrastructure.  Amazon, Alphabet, and Meta Platforms are three tech titans set to benefit from AI.  Palantir and Salesforce are two leading software companies that have big AI opportunities ahead.
